title: Can we boycott relatives or kinship who deal with black magic?
transcript:
Binyamin says; 'Can we boycott our kinship who 
deal with black magic?' The answer is 'Yes'.   As long as it has been proved, and the proof 
is beyond doubt, the evidences can stand in a   court of law, and you fear for yourself and your 
family - you can boycott them physically. But,   if you call them once every blue moon on the 
phone, if you know that they need help and   you send them money but you don't go and meet 
them face to face, there's no problem in that.
